tool_description: A password generator that creates easy-to-remember readable pronounceable passwords.
name: Password Generator
title: Password Generator

api_list.name: password
api_list.description:
Generates a password with standard settings
- length = 10
- 1 special char
- 2 numbers

optional_parameters.name: spchar
optional_parameters.description: Number of special characters to be used

optional_parameters.name: quantity
optional_parameters.description: Number of passwords issued, max is 10 per call.

optional_parameters.name: umlauts
optional_parameters.description: If specified, German umlauts will be used like ä,ö,ü

optional_parameters.name: length
optional_parameters.description: Creates a password with the given length, max length is 32  chars

optional_parameters.name: numbers
optional_parameters.description: Number of digits to be used
